attributes.action: recognise the fact that the Prime Minister was elected on the understanding that he would serve a full term, and therefore call to ratify his successor through a general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the last general election the Prime Minister promised to serve a full term, and it was on that understanding he was elected. The British public did not vote to allow the Labour Party to itself choose who would serve half of the term with no direct mandate from the people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
